title: Movie Night: Kung Fu Hustle
location: Freer Gallery of Art Meyer Auditorium
description: This anarchic homage to—and parody of—classic martial arts movies is nonstop action fueled by outrageous special effects. Featuring a cast of legendary Hong Kong action stars, Kung Fu Hustle pits the ragtag denizens of a rundown slum against the dapper and ruthless Axe Gang. With this breakthrough film, director Stephen Chow (Shaolin Soccer, The Mermaid) catapulted from clown prince of Hong Kong to worldwide sensation.

title: DC Coffee Festival
description: The DC Coffee Festival is a celebration of coffee culture in the nation's capital. It features a wide range of coffee vendors, coffee-related vendors, and activities for coffee enthusiasts.

title: Cherry Blossom Festival
description: What began with a gift in 1912 at the Tidal Basin now spans four weeks throughout Washington, DC, and neighboring communities in Maryland and Virginia. Residents and visitors are invited to celebrate all that spring in Washington, DC has to offer

title: Fire House Fridays
description: Interested in country dancing? Join us every Friday night for a fun and lively dance party! No experience necessary, just bring your dancing shoes and a smile. We'll provide the music and instruction, so you can enjoy the night without worrying about the steps. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned dancer, this is a great way to meet new people and have a great time. Don't miss out on the fun! See you there!

title: Dupont Circle Farmers Market
description: The Dupont Circle Farmers Market is a vibrant and diverse market that offers a wide range of fresh, locally grown produce, artisanal foods, and handcrafted goods. It's a popular spot for locals and visitors alike, providing a unique shopping experience in the heart of the city.

title: Eastern Market Farmers Market
description: Take a stroll down the Farmers' Line and find stall after stall of the freshest food available in Washington, DC. Most of the produce sold at Eastern Market is grown in rural counties in Maryland, Pennsylvania, Virginia, and West Virginia. Hours for the Eastern Market farmers' markets are: Tuesdays from 12pm-4pm, Saturdays & Sundays from 9am-3pm

title: Trivia @ Kingfisher
description: Every Tuesday is trivia night in DC! Get a team together, or play solo, and come by tonight for one of the best trivia nights in town, hosted by the lovely geeks of GeeksWhoDrink.com. The games start at 8:00, but get here early to grab a seat and a little of that sweet happy hour action. It's free to play and you can win beer.
